message.name: HTTP_404_PERSON_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for the specified person_id. Please use a valid person_id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_404_IDENTIFICATION_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record found for the specified identification_type_code %1s and identification_value %2s. Please use a valid identification_type_code and identification_type_value and try again.

message.name: HTTP_400_IDENTIFICATION_TYPE_CODE_IDENTIFICATION_VALUE_REQUIRED
message.locale: Please provide a value for both identification_value and identification_type_code.
